extra.enrollment_requirement: (GISC201 AND GPHY247) OR (GISQ202 AND GPHY247) OR (GIMS201 AND GPHY247) OR (GPHY349 AND GPHY247)

basic.description: Study of the techniques of Geographic Information Systems and their applications in solving physical and environmental problems. Topics include data representation and models, spatial interpolation, raster-based analysis and modelling, surface models and terrain analysis, data visualization, temporal analysis, error and accuracy, and other algorithms and analytical procedures.
basic.subject: GISC
basic.title: Environmental Modelling
